description:
This plugin was built as a demonstration on how to use server actions as part of a buildcamp community livestream. 

Find the community post here 👉 https://community.buildcamp.io/c/announcements/learn-how-to-build-bubble-plugins-with-server-actions
name: USA Weather
plugin_instructions:
If you need the current forecast for a location:


🏃‍♀️ Run the 'Get Current Weather' action
👍🏻 Use the data returned by the action

If you need the closest forecast for a specific location + date in the future:

🏃‍♀️ Run the 'Get Closest Weather' action
👍🏻 Use the data returned by the action
⚠️ Date must be within 5 days from now

Demo available here 👉🏽 https://bubble.io/page?name=index&id=usa-weather
